title: Remote Memory Exposure
author: Сковорода Никита Андреевич (https://github.com/ChALkeR)
overview:
`.write(number)` in the affected `floody` versions passes a number to Buffer constructor, appending a chunk of uninitialized memory.
PoC: `var f = require('floody')(process.stdout); f.write(1000); f.stop();`
